author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Support my team and I to make more videos like this at: https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

Capitalism is dead. Killed by its own biggest fans. That's the thesis of economist and author Yanis Varoufakis. In his book Technofeudalism, he argues that markets and profits have been replaced by digital fiefdoms and economic rents.

I met up with Yanis while he was in London promoting his new book Raise Your Soul to ask him about the cloudalists, Trump 2.0, and how to survive in a world which appears to be ever lurching to the right.

Directed and Presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Additional research and production assistance by Jack Carter.

With thanks to Yanis Varoufakis.

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Nebula at https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-capitalism-is-dead-this-is-what-comes-next

Support my work on Patreon at https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

title: Capitalism is Dead. This is What Comes Next.
